original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 319.00/32.00 to the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee was closed at 319.00/320.00 to the US dollar on Tuesday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 320.00/320.50 to the US dollar on Tuesday
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 11.50/12.00 after closing on Tuesday at 13.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 closed down at 11.95/12.50 percent after closing at 13.30/45 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed down at 12.40/75 percent after closing at 14.25/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed down at 12.40/75 percent from closing at 14.40/55 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed down 12.75/13.75 after closing at 15.90/16.00 percent. (Colombo/Aug09/2023)
